Name: Lord of Darkness: Prologue
About the game: Lord of Darkness: Prologue is a fantasy game made in pixel-based graphics, just like in the good old days of the early dawn of Japanese rpg. An epic adventure full of dangers and hardships awaits you. Tired of standard JRPG games? Then here you will see a lot of stamps of the genre. The player expects a completely 'normal' adventure. And also on your way to meet a couple of dungeons and dozens of different monsters. The game features nostalgic music and an eerily simple plot. The Lord of Darkness has attacked the lands of the local king. In turn, the hapless ruler asks for your help! Interesting dialogues and small size of the game combined with a world full of interesting places will not let you get bored. Will the hero be strong enough to defeat the Lord of Darkness? You will find out in your own adventure!
